name: Swarm of the Plague Babies
description:
There's babies, right, they've got a plague, right, and they're swarming. 

Join local YouTelly conspiracy theorist Morette as he battles to uncover the truth behind said plague baby swarm. Or not.

Point and Click Adventure by Charlotte Gore, developer of Yorkshire Gubbins and Aye Fair Lady, and Alan Gillhespy.

Made in 2 weeks for the AdventureX Jam.

-----
